BPCells 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Fragment I/O

Read & write fragment objects

open_fragments_10x() write_fragments_10x()
Read/write a 10x fragments file
write_fragments_memory() write_fragments_dir() open_fragments_dir() write_fragments_hdf5() open_fragments_hdf5()
Read/write BPCells fragment objects
convert_to_fragments()
Build a Fragments object from an R data frame or GRanges object

ATAC Analysis Utilities

qc_scATAC()
Calculate ArchR-compatible per-cell QC statistics
nucleosome_counts()
Count fragments by nucleosomal size
footprint()
Get footprints around a set of genomic coordinates
peak_matrix()
Calculate ranges x cells overlap matrix
tile_matrix()
Calculate ranges x cells tile overlap matrix
geneScoreTilesArchR()
Calculate gene-tile distances for ArchR gene activities
geneScoreWeightsArchR()
Calculate GeneActivityScore weights matrix
length_distribution()
Count fragments by size
order_ranges()
Get end-sorted ordering for genome ranges

Fragment Transformers

Transforming fragment objects

shift_fragments()
Shift start or end coordinates
select_chromosomes()
Select chromosmes for subsetting or translating chromosome IDs in a fragments object
select_cells()
Select cells for subsetting or translating cells IDs in a fragments object
subset_lengths()
Subset fragments to only include those in a given size range
select_regions()
Select fragments overlapping (or not overlapping) selected regions
prefix_cell_names()
Rename cells by adding a prefix to the names (e.g. sample name)

Fragment Utilities

Other fragment functions

show(<IterableFragments>) cellNames() `cellNames<-`() chrNames() `chrNames<-`()
IterableFragments methods
scan_fragments()
Scan through fragments without performing any operations (used for benchmarking)

Matrix I/O

Functions for reading & writing sparse matrices

open_matrix_10x_hdf5() write_matrix_10x_hdf5()
Read/write a 10x feature matrix
open_matrix_anndata_hdf5()
Read AnnData matrix
write_matrix_memory() write_matrix_dir() open_matrix_dir() write_matrix_hdf5() open_matrix_hdf5()
Read/write sparse matrices

Matrix Utilities

matrix_stats()
Calculate matrix stats
convert_matrix_type()
Convert the type of a matrix
transpose_storage_order()
Transpose the storage order for a matrix
show(<IterableMatrix>) t(<IterableMatrix>) `%*%`(<IterableMatrix>,<matrix>) rowSums(<IterableMatrix>) colSums(<IterableMatrix>) rowMeans(<IterableMatrix>) colMeans(<IterableMatrix>)
IterableMatrix methods
min_scalar()
Take the elementwise min with a constant

Reference Annotations

human_gene_mapping mouse_gene_mapping
Gene Symbol Mapping data
match_gene_symbol() canonical_gene_symbol()
Gene symbol matching
read_gtf() read_gencode_genes()
Read GTF gene annotations
read_bed() read_encode_blacklist()
Read a bed file into a data frame

Clustering

knn_hnsw() knn_annoy()
Get a knn matrix from reduced dimensions
cluster_graph_leiden() cluster_graph_louvain() cluster_graph_seurat()
Cluster an adjacency matrix
knn_to_graph() knn_to_snn_graph()
K Nearest Neighbor (KNN) Graph

Plots

plot_read_count_knee()
Make a knee plot of single cell read counts

Internal Functions

Unexported functions for internal use

LinearOperator-class
Represent a sparse matrix-vector product operation
linear_operator()
Construct a LinearOperator object
iterate_matrix()
Get a wrapped pointer to the iterable matrix, in the form of an XPtrList (see fragments.R)
matrix_type()
Get the matrix data type (mat_uint32_t, mat_float, or mat_double for now)
matrix_is_transform()
Return boolean whether the matrix is a transform
merge_dimnames()
Helper function for rbind/cbind merging dimnames
concat_dimnames()
Helper function for rbind/cbind concatenating dimnames
normalized_dimnames()
Helper function to set dimnames to NULL instead of 0-length character vectors
distanceToNearestDirectional()
Find signed distance to nearest genomic ranges
extendGenomicRanges()
Extend GenomicRanges in a strand-aware fashion.
fragments_identical()
Check if two fragments objects are identical
XPtrList-class
This class is used to hold a list of external pointers.
wrapFragments()
Wrap an inner XPtrList with an outer externalptr object (Rcpp::XPtr)
wrapMatrix()
Construct an S4 matrix object wrapping another matrix object
ensure_downloaded()
Download a file with a custom timeout
normalize_ranges()
Normalize an object representing genomic ranges
